local_intent: Execute grasp of the white plate: detect, approach/align, compute grasp, pick, and verify object in gripper.
assumptions: Gripper is open and available (opened earlier in global plan).
White plate is within sensor view and reachable by the arm.
ComputeGraspPose will publish 'white_plate_grasp' for Pick to consume.
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase from the global BT: perception (DetectObject with retries), coarse approach (MoveTo), orientation (SetTCPYaw), fine alignment (ApproachAndAlign), grasp computation, pick action, and verification (ObjectInGripper). Values and strategies match the global plan.
